article_title: Clinton blasts Sanders for failing to say how he would pay for costly health care plan
article_text:
Sanders accuses her of flip-flopping on health care, engaging in false attacks

Clinton’s campaign criticizes senator as race for Democratic nomination tightens

Former secretary of state has proposed at least $1 trillion in spending plans

article_metadata.title: Clinton blasts Sanders for failing to say how he would pay for costly health care plan | McClatchy DC

og.description: With the race for the Democratic nomination tightening, front-runner Hillary Clinton is criticizing her chief rival Bernie Sanders for failing to say how he would pay for a health care plan some have estimated to cost $15 trillion.
og.title: Clinton blasts Sanders for failing to say how he would pay for costly health care plan
